00025    * Constructor.

00027    OutputEnergy::OutputEnergy(Simulation& simulation) 
00028     : Diagnostic(simulation),
00029       nSample_(0),
00030       isInitialized_(false)
00031    {}

00033    /*
00034    * Read interval and outputFileName. 
00035    */
00036    void OutputEnergy::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00037    {
00038       readInterval(in);
00039       readOutputFileName(in);
00040       isInitialized_ = true;
00041    }
00042 
00043    /*
00044    * Read interval and outputFileName. 
00045    */
00046    void OutputEnergy::setup() 
00047    {  
00048        nSample_ = 0; 
00049       //std::string filename;
00050       //filename  = outputFileName();
00051       //simulation().fileMaster().openOutputFile(filename, outputFile_);
00052    }
00053 
00054    /*
00055    * Dump configuration to file
00056    */
00057    void OutputEnergy::sample(long iStep) 
00058    {
00059       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00060          Simulation& sys = simulation();
00061          sys.computeKineticEnergy();
00062          sys.computePotentialEnergies();
00063          if (sys.domain().isMaster()) {
00064             double kinetic = sys.kineticEnergy();
00065             double potential = sys.potentialEnergy();
00066             std::cout << Int(iStep, 10)
00067                       << Dbl(kinetic, 20)
00068                       << Dbl(potential, 20)
00069                       << Dbl(kinetic + potential, 20)
00070                       << std::endl;
00071          }
00072 
00073          ++nSample_;
00074       }
00075    }
00076 
00077 }
